text: Winston Ntshona (6 October 1941 â€“ 2 August 2018) was a South African playwright and actor. He won a Tony Award for Best Featured Actor in a Play in 1975. He was born in Port Elizabeth, South Africa. Ntshona wrote the 1973 play The Island. He also wrote Sizwe Banzi is Dead, which he also co-wrote.James M. Manheim, "Winston Ntshona Biography", biography.jrank.org. Ntshona starred in the play Full Frontal at the Royal Court Theatre in London.Three Plays by Michael Hastings. London, Penguin, 1980.
